alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 1:23AM PST until December 20 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...North Oregon and South Washington coastal valleys, as well as valleys in the Willapa Hills. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will vary considerably along US Highways 30 and 101. The greatest concentration of fog will be near the lower Columbia River, Youngs Bay, and the Tillamook Valley.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Pedestrians and cyclists should wear bright or reflective clothing to increase the chance of being seen by others in the dense fog.
